original_title: Retrato de un artista como ser humano
overview: Experimental documentary by the artist that shows various happenings made over the years with Marie Louise Alemann and Walther Mej√≠a. As in a ritual, the different elements that have intervened in these events are thrown into the river. Film in the form of a personal diary that documents the artistic events carried out throughout an era.
title: Retrato de un artista como ser humano
